title: Urban Meyer, Jon Gruden, Tom Brady, and Dak Prescott
itunes:title: Urban Meyer, Jon Gruden, Tom Brady, and Dak Prescott
description:
Colin discusses the developing story about Ohio State University HC Urban Meyer, why Oakland Raiders HC Jon Gruden might not be the right fit, New England Patriots QB Tom Brady's past issues with owner Robert Kraft, and why Dallas Cowboys QB Dak Prescott is a great leader. Guests include Bruce Feldman, Rashad Jennings, and Greg Cosell.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
